author: [victor...@gmail.com](https://code.google.com/u/102828971930324493638/)
title: Crash when playing at the late stage of the game

comments.body: Thanks for the crash report! I noticed you are using 1.30, so the line numbers in the report are a but outdated. If possible, do try with 1.31 as well.
comments.author: [melvinzh...@gmail.com](https://code.google.com/u/108278210804167927868/)

content:
_From [victor...@gmail.com](https://code.google.com/u/102828971930324493638/) on November 09, 2012 22:13:44_

What happened exactly?
It was my turn when I tried to perform an action using an attacker card on the computer when suddenly the game crashes.
It's quite hard to pinpoint exactly what causes this as I have had several other crashes playing different decks at late stage that occurred the same way. What steps will reproduce the problem? Basically I tried reproducing the problem by playing the same deck of card (fire deck) against a random deck to reproduce the problem but to no avail. What version of the product are you using? On what operating system? For some reason the crash keeps saying that I'm using JRE 1.7.0_05
When in fact I've changed my system library to jdk1.6.0_35 
as shown here http://imageshack.us/f/577/magarenaversion.png/ This is the latest crash report I recorded after updating and building to latest using MecurialEclipse: 

CRASH REPORT FOR MAGARENA THREAD Thread[Thread-374,1,main]
CREATED ON 2012/11/09 07:01:39
